text:
HOW TO FIGHT CORRUPTION AND CHEATING! 
- Automatic voter registration at age 18 
- Only US Government money and small private personal donations (max $20) to campaigns
- No Big Bussiness buying politicians
- Abolish Gerrymandering, Electoral College and the unneccessary Senate 
- Only one election of all House members each 4th year
- Number of State representatives to the House according to State population
- The majority (most votes) in the House wins and appoints their president
- All Presidential orders, bills and pardons to be voted upon by the House
- All votes to be counted and summarized 
- Impeachment to be handled by the Supreme Court
- The Supreme Court to be appointed by the 5 foremost universities teaching Law
- Though criminal laws to stop lying presidents, representatives and lying media
- All power to the House now making the laws
